content:
# It appears that I no longer have any coal in my inventory, which explains why I couldn't insert it into the furnace. 
# This situation likely occurred because I attempted to insert coal into the furnace without successfully retaining it after crafting.

# Step 32: I need to gather more coal to proceed with the smelting process. 
# I will search for the nearest coal resource and move to it.

nearest_coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Find the nearest coal resource.
move_to(nearest_coal_position)  # Move to the coal resource patch.
